Class FileHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • FileHandler

  • public class FileHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Seth Moudry, Benjamin Michaels, Levi King Class to handle the opening and saving of folders and files

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void buildFileList(java.io.File file)
      Builds an array of the files in a directory
      void chooseFiles()
      Calls jfilechooser and loads a file or folder
      void chooseSaveDirectory()
      Saves a file in the chosen directory with the chosen name, prints the html code to a file
      void emptyPool()
      Empties the file list/pool
      java.io.File getExampleFile()
      Returns the first file in the pool
      int getFileCount()

      Returns the arraylist of files
      void removeFromFileList(java.util.ArrayList<java.io.File> arrayList)
      Removes first file in the list
      void skipFile()
      Moves the first file in the queue to the end, If filepool is empty, does nothing
